SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AsciiArtAlgorithm
This class used by the shell class to create an Ascii image.
AsciiOutput
An object implementing this interface can output a 2D array of chars in some fashion.
calcSubImageBrightness
This class is in charge of calculating the brightness of the subImages.
CharConverter
A class that is used to convert a character to a boolean array that represents the character's image.
ConsoleAsciiOutput
Output a 2D array of chars to the console.
Git
A class that is used as a save to gain runtime and avoid unnecessary operations.
HtmlAsciiOutput
Output a 2D array of chars to an HTML file viewable in a web browser.
Image
A package-private class of the package image.
PaddingImage
This class is in charge of padding the image to the next power of two.
Shell
This class is used as the main entry of the program, She is in charge to set the parameters and to run activate the ascii algorithm
SubImage
This class is in charge of extracting the subImages from the image.
SubImgCharMatcher
A class that is used to match a character to a brightness It's based on the principle of momentum that we learned in class.
